website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive stainless steel cleaning product that works on aluminum and chrome surfaces, too.
pros: Works for both cleaning and polishing the metal surface
Offers users a good price per ounce of cleaner
Works when applied with a steel wool pad, thanks to the powder consistency
Easy to rinse residue after cleaning
cons: Some problems with quality control and containers arriving broken or cracked

customer_reviews.title: Packaging a mess.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know about the product itself yet as I am still trying to clean up the mess when I opened the bag in which it was delivered. Who would box 2 small plastic containers that if one looks at the top cap flies off with two 10 lb bottles of liquid sealant? No padding - so guess what? The two 10 lb bottles of sealant crashed on top of the small containers and popped the lid on one. When I opened the plastic bag surrounding the Cameo cleaner containers, one of them popped its lid completely off and cleaner went everywhere. I am now down 1/2 Cameo cleaner as I could not salvage any that spilled. Jeez.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest cleaning product for stainless steel but is becoming difficult to find. Will always use!
customer_reviews.author: Survivor2008

customer_reviews.title: Very similar to other scouring powders, nice container though
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of these scouring powders (bon ami, barkeeps friend, etc.) They're all kind of the same, though barkeeps friend might be a bit stronger. Main reason I really like Cameo...and I realize that this is a bit silly...it's the container. It's actually got a lid that snaps closed. Most of the others that are available come in these paperboard containers with no lid...they kind of remind me of something I would have found under grandma's kitchen sink. So seeing how they're all pretty similar in formula anyway...the container puts this one over the top for me.
customer_reviews.author: Agent_CooperTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Shine, Sparkle... EASY!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't know about Cameo cleaner then you've really been missing out. Have copper bottom or copper pots? Keep them sparkling clean using Cameo, and Brillo afterwards OR shine them with a Blitz cloth! This stuff is amazing, also keeping stainless steel sparkly shiny. Using Cameo makes keeping things like copper, brass, stainless steel bright, shiny and sparkly with EASE!
customer_reviews.author: JeMicheSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Before and after... Truly ridiculously amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Everytime I use this product, it's like having a brand new set of pots and pans
customer_reviews.author: Kam I.

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t think the end result produced shine
customer_reviews.text: Idk why my experience with this product is negative when most reviewed with stellar results. I have a stainless sink and a stainless thermador stovetop. When I used Cameo on both I found the end result to be dull and very hard to remove the Cameo powder residue. After rinsing and air dry i would see a dull film and even after thoroughly rinsing and no film it wasn’t as shiny as my usual cleaning technique. I will just stick with Fantastik let sit and wipe or Brillo or SOS pad on super baked on stove mess.
customer_reviews.author: mideco

customer_reviews.title: worked better than other scourers but still left a few stains inside burnt pot
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work as well as other reviews said it worked. Bottom inside of pot remained stained in several places. It took a lot of hard scrubbing and a lot of the powder to get it as clean as possible, which wasn't very clean., but it was an improvement over other scouring powders and vinegar and other things. Pot was badly burnt to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: racoon

customer_reviews.title: Great Stainless Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this product for years in stores. When I first saw it online I thought perhaps it was a fake. However, my stainless pans were not getting any more polished by waiting a few more years to "discover" it in a store, so I ordered online. Yes! this is the Cameo I remember. I use in for my very best stainless steel cookware. I would use it on high grade stainless only. Do not use on aluminum.....much too efficacious.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Scratched my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: I tested it on the upper part of my machine and worked fine. However, the lower part of the dishwasher was a slightly different material and it scratched the finish. It also takes a lot more time to apply and remove than the spray on polish I've used before. I'm not sure how I'm going to remove the scratches, but realize I should have tested it on both materials.
customer_reviews.author: J. Foy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent/easy for removing black tarnish from stainless steel pans
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for removing black tarnish from stainless steel pans. I recently moved from the SE to the SW. My expensive stainless steel pans began tarnishing, leaving black stains wherever they came into contact. I was about to throw them out. Then I saw an add for Cameo Brillo. Easy to use! I was expecting a difficult task of scrubbing! But, the black tarnish was all cleaned upon one light scrub! I will continue to use Cameo!
customer_reviews.author: Earle

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended for our Lifetime Stainless cookware. We have used it since purchasing our cookware over 40 years ago. we still have the cookware and it looks great. Cameo has kept it looking great for over 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M. Centa

customer_reviews.title: I love Cameo. I used it for years to clean ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Cameo. I used it for years to clean my stainless steel sink and was not aware that the grocery store no longer sold it. I tried different products, but found that none of them worked like the Cameo that I had used for many years. I was thrilled to find it on Amazon, ordered it, and my old sink cleaned up so pretty and had that nice shine that it used to have when it was new. I hope that Amazon will continue to sell it, so that I can always have a sink that I can be proud for people to look at.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ruth Berdine

customer_reviews.title: My sink looks like new
customer_reviews.text: excellent,. The apartment where I live it's old so the sink as well, I tried everything to make it shine and clean; so I look on Amanzon for a different brand to clean aluminum , I found this. It took all the stains away and leaves shining perfect stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Faby

customer_reviews.title: There were some serious black stains in my mom's sink ...
customer_reviews.text: There were some serious black stains in my mom's sink from (I'm thinking CLR).... Took them out with some elbow grease... Tried several times before....THIS STUFF WORK FABULOUSLY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Use this product in kitchen to clean stainless steel pots and sinks to keep them looking like new. Sadly, local retailers not stock this locally. What they stkck not work nearly as well
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have use Cameo Cleanser since my teenage years (late 1960's-early 1970's) with my mother and was so happy to find it on Amazon when I cannot find it in any stores now. This works great on so many surfaces without damaging.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: BEST STAINLESS STEEL EVER!
customer_reviews.text: this is the only stainless steel cleaner that really works. When I begin to clean I can feel the stains resisting. When I know the pan is clean I feel no resisting. I give it a swift swish with soapy water to get rid of the cleanser residue and rinse. Then I watch the water just glide off.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Zepeda

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner for stainless steel.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years on my pots and pans. I really liked it. Made my pots and shine along with them being shiny. Until recently I haven't been able to find it in my local stores. So glad I was able to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Cameo is great for cleaning stainless steel pans. It is particularly good for cleaning the residue from cooking beans; cameo plus a little soap, water and a Scotch Brite type pad does the trick. I have a difficult time finding it stocked in stores. It seems it is a product with high demand but low stocking.
customer_reviews.author: robit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed how much the shined up my stainless steel sink. In fact, the rag that I used was so black that I decided to throw it away. I will have a shiny sink from here on.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stainless steel pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: My favorite product to shine up my pots and pans & Kitchen sinks! Sprinkle on a dampened pan/surface, rub in with a damp cloth, rinse, and towel dry. Keeps stainless steel shiny like new!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M

customer_reviews.title: Always use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased stainless steel cookware years ago. Almost 20 now, use this for all the times I 'forget' how easy food can stick. Works like a charm! I hope they never go out of business in my lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: emalee monkey

customer_reviews.title: OK for light oxidation.
customer_reviews.text: OK for minor oxidation. I used it on Aluminum door with many years of heavy oxidation. It cleaned the indoor side fairly well but not so good on the outside which was exposed to many years of elements.
customer_reviews.author: Ghoulagha

customer_reviews.title: Really does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product I like for my stainless sink. I have tried others but keep coming back to this. Not easy to find as it was years ago. Works the best.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M.

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser for stainless steel!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years and used to be able to buy it at the grocery store - was happy to see it was available through Amazon. Quick delivery - I buy the two pack, and it lasts a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: MKE PE Teach

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Cameo works really well to clean up pots after use. Even if you burn something on the pot, it will take it off (with a little scrubbing).

customer_reviews.title: Great on stains in pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years but couldn't find it in the grocery store so I tried Amazon. Easily takes away the stains from pots and pans that soap and water won't. Easy to use - don't have to scrub, just wash as you would do with soap. But I do rinse with soap and water afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product! I've been using it for probably 25-30 years. Wow, that sounds depressing, but true. I started using this when I was raising my family many moons ago. Haven't been able to find it locally so I turned to Amazon. Glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find this product on Amazon. This is a great scouring powder and makes my stainless steel sink sparkle.

customer_reviews.title: Don't use to much water. Make a paste consistency and use with paper towel.

customer_reviews.text: I prefer this over Ajax and it works so well to remove that stuck on grime and make your pots shine.

customer_reviews.title: Not The Same
customer_reviews.text: not the same Cameo you are looking for. something is different with this I was so happy when I found this on Amazon Cameo was a great product that was far superior to all other stainless steel cleaners out there this is not. Doesn't get my pans clean without extreme scrubbing I'm not talking years of built up residue I'm talking one dinner cooked in a shiny pan although the old cameo would have cleaned a 30 year old revere pot shiny with out much effort and without damaging the pan this left tiny scratch marks on my pan and didn't clean any more efficiently that the cheap stuff from the dollar store. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: R. BRADFORD

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Been using it for decades. Can’t find it in stores near me so I am delighted to be able to get it online.

customer_reviews.title: best...

Suddenly, it has become impossible to find in local stores. THANK YOU, AMAZON!! This stuff is great, if you want YOUR stainless steel to look like the day you bought it. Works great. I LOVE it. Local stores, if you read this ... learn. Amazon gives me the products I need without hoofing it all over town. Sorry. I would have bought from you had you had it in stock.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cleaner for the money.

customer_reviews.text: We ordered same as what is pictured above: Cameo Aluminum & Stainless Steel Cleaner! What we got was different: Brillo Cameo Aluminum, Stainless Steel, Copper, Brass & Porcelain Cleaner! This will be returned for refund!

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner, works as advertised

Can't find it in my local markets anymore.

product_meta.title: Cameo Aluminum & Stainless Steel Cleaner - 10 oz - 2 pk
product_meta.description: When it's time to clean and polish common household surfaces, choose Cameo. Removes tarnish in seconds, leaving a like-new shine that is long-lasting with less frequent cleaning. Requires no hard rubbing and leaves no gritty residue. Use for all your aluminum and copper pots, pans, utensils and sinks, bathtubs and ceramic tile surfaces. It's great on chrome, Cookware, Appliances, Sinks, Countertops, Deep Fryers, Microwaves, Nonporous Surfaces, Range Hoods, Refrigerators, and Stoves. Applicable Material: Stainless Steel, Aluminum, Chrome copper, brass and Porcelain.
feature_bullets: Cameo Aluminum & Stainless Steel Cleaner 10 oz. (Pack of 2)
For use on Aluminum & Stainless Steel
